mapper.insert: insert into art(ano ,category, nickname, passwd, deal_way, deal_code, product_code, hprice, region, tel, email, quantity, title, content, purc_date, userid, thumb, file1, file2, file3, file4, file5, size1, size2, size3, size4, size5) values ((SELECT NVL(MAX(ano), 0)+1 as ano FROM art), #{category}, #{nickname}, #{passwd}, #{deal_way}, #{deal_code}, #{product_code}, #{hprice}, #{region}, #{tel}, #{email}, #{quantity}, #{title}, #{content}, #{purc_date}, #{userid}, #{thumb}, #{file1}, #{file2}, #{file3}, #{file4}, #{file5}, #{size1}, #{size2}, #{size3}, #{size4}, #{size5} )
mapper.select: select ano ,category, nickname, passwd, deal_way, deal_code, product_code, hprice, region, tel, email, quantity, title, content, purc_date, userid, thumb, file1, file2, file3, file4, file5, size1, size2, size3, size4, size5 from art ORDER BY ano DESC

SELECT COUNT(*) as cnt FROM art
where title LIKE '%' || #{word} || '%'
where content LIKE '%' || #{word} || '%'
where category LIKE '%' || #{word} || '%'
where title LIKE '%' || #{word} || '%' OR content LIKE '%' || #{word} || '%'

SELECT ano, nickname, userid, passwd, category, deal_way, deal_code, product_code, hprice, purc_date, region, title, content, thumb, file1, size1, file2, size2, file3, size3, file4, size4, file5, size5, email, tel, wdate FROM art WHERE ano=#{ano}
mapper.update: UPDATE art SET passwd=#{passwd}, nickname=#{nickname}, title=#{title}, category=#{category}, deal_code=#{deal_code}, region=#{region}, deal_way=#{deal_way}, purc_date=#{purc_date}, content=#{content}, hprice=#{hprice}, product_code=#{product_code}, thumb=#{thumb}, file1=#{file1}, size1=#{size1}, file2=#{file2}, size2=#{size2}, file3=#{file3}, size3=#{size3}, file4=#{file4}, size4=#{size4}, file5=#{file5}, size5=#{size5}, email=#{email} WHERE ano=#{ano}
mapper.select: SELECT ano, title, deal_code, product_code, region, deal_way, purc_date, hprice, userid, nickname, thumb, file1, wdate FROM art WHERE ano >= (SELECT (MAX(ano)-7) FROM art)
